name: Page UI
title: pageui.shipixen.com
shortDescription: Page UI offers a collection of landing page components and templates specifically designed for React developers using TailwindCSS. It simplifies the process of building visually appealing and high-converting landing pages by allowing users to copy and paste pre-designed sections directly into their codebase. Ideal for developers looking to save time on design and focus more on functionality.
pros: Easy to integrate with existing projects

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Material-UI
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Offers React components for faster dev

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Bulma
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Modern CSS framework based on Flexbox
